name: Infernal Memo
description:
When Hellen Wheeler's game dev office is sucked into hell and all her coworkers turned into demons, she has no choice but to blast her way to the rooftop and escape.

Step into Hellen's shoes as she learns first-hand what happens when management mixes bits of the Necronomicon into the game design doc. Armed with a high-powered pistol, a triple-barreled shotgun, and Hellen's trusty red Swingline stapler, fight your way through every classic FPS cliché from crates, to exploding barrels, to even more crates. It's kind of dumb. It's over the top. It's INFERNAL MEMO!

Controls

It's an FPS. What more do you need? Okay, fine:

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • C to crouch
  • Shift to run
  • Mouse to aim
  • Click to shoot
Credits
  • Game Design: Darrell
  • Programming: Caleb, Marton, Greenlaser, Shim
  • Art: Dreamerflow, enenra, nagi, smokey, Steve, Zora 
  • Sound Design: Jiro
